casebody.data:
WBTV, LLC, Plaintiff,
v.
ASHE COUNTY, THROUGH the ASHE COUNTY BOARD OF COMMISSIONERS; William Sands in his Capacity as Chairman; Paula Perry in her Capacity as Vice Chair ; Larry Rhodes, Jeff Rose, Gary Roark in their Capacities as Members of the Board of Commissioners; Sam Yearick in his Capacity as County Manager; Terry Buchanan, in his Capacity as the Ashe County Sheriff (Suspended); Richard Clayton in his Capacity as the Acting Ashe County Sheriff; and John T. Kilby and Kilby & Hurley in their Capacity as County Attorneys, Defendants. No. COA18-452 Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed: December 4, 2018

DISMISSED.
